activities: Subject identifying information for clinical trials is received from investigative study sites with samples for testing.  Information is required to determine which samples belong to which patient.  Information that may be required includes gender, subject initials and/or subject date of birth.  If per country data protection requirements, assigned subject initials (ex. AAA) and/or assigned birth date (ex. 01JAN and actual year of birth) are used.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: birth dates, gender, subject initials - Collected from study sites and stored on secure network
recoursemech:
EU Data Protection Authorities
Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC
